Mod.name: Subnoitica
Mod.description:
A total conversion mod based around the popular underwater survival game Subnautica.
Github: https://github.com/mole-den/subnoitica
Discord 1: https://discord.gg/mmMxjDBGnS For support, discussion, suggestions and such about Subnoitca and other mods.
Discord 2: https://discord.gg/JuRC6FqXkb General discord for other things and other mods.
> Developers
Master of Copium Artwork, Tools, Items, Spells
Gustavo Scripting and backend work, Blueprint and crafting system
SirMole Creatures, World generation and biomes, Project direction
TheOneTheOnlySpoopyBoi Artwork, Concept Art
> Special Thanks
